verses.verse: אֵיכָה֙ <S%H349><s%> how יוּעַ֣ם <S%H6004><s%> become dim זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> How is the gold יִשְׁנֶ֖א <S%H8132><s%> changed הַכֶּ֣תֶם <S%H3800><s%> fine gold הַטּ֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [how] is the most תִּשְׁתַּפֵּ֙כְנָה֙ <S%H8210><s%> are poured out אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> the stones קֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary בְּרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> in the top כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every חוּצֽוֹת׃ <S%H2351><s%> of every street ס

בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> sons צִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> of Zion הַיְקָרִ֔ים <S%H3368><s%> The precious הַמְסֻלָּאִ֖ים <S%H5537><s%> comparable בַּפָּ֑ז <S%H6337><s%> to fine gold אֵיכָ֤ה <S%H349><s%> how נֶחְשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H2803><s%> how are they esteemed לְנִבְלֵי־ <S%H5035><s%> pitchers חֶ֔רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> as earthen מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יְדֵ֥י <S%H3027><s%> of the hands יוֹצֵֽר׃ <S%H3335><s%> of the potter ס

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even [תַּנִּין כ] (תַּנִּים֙ <S%H8568><s%> dragon ק) חָ֣לְצוּ <S%H2502><s%> draw out שַׁ֔ד <S%H7699><s%> the breast הֵינִ֖יקוּ <S%H3243><s%> they give suck גּוּרֵיהֶ֑ן <S%H1482><s%> to their young ones בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> of my people לְאַכְזָ֔ר <S%H393><s%> [is become] cruel [כִּי <S%H3283><s%> ostrich כ] [עֵנִים כ] (כַּיְעֵנִ֖ים <S%H3283><s%> ostrich ק) בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness ס

דָּבַ֨ק <S%H1692><s%> cleaveth לְשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> The tongue יוֹנֵ֛ק <S%H3243><s%> of the sucking child אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִכּ֖וֹ <S%H2441><s%> to the roof of his mouth בַּצָּמָ֑א <S%H6772><s%> for thirst עֽוֹלָלִים֙ <S%H5768><s%> the young children שָׁ֣אֲלוּ <S%H7592><s%> ask לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread פֹּרֵ֖שׂ <S%H6566><s%> [and] no man breaketh אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like ס

הָאֹֽכְלִים֙ <S%H398><s%> They that did feed לְמַ֣עֲדַנִּ֔ים <S%H4574><s%> delicately נָשַׁ֖מּוּ <S%H8074><s%> are desolate בַּחוּצ֑וֹת <S%H2351><s%> in the streets הָאֱמֻנִים֙ <S%H539><s%> they that were brought up עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> in תוֹלָ֔ע <S%H8438><s%> in scarlet חִבְּק֖וּ <S%H2263><s%> embrace אַשְׁפַּתּֽוֹת׃ <S%H830><s%> dunghills ס

וַיִּגְדַּל֙ <S%H1431><s%> is greater עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> For the punishment of the iniquity בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> of my people מֵֽחַטַּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> than the punishment סְדֹ֑ם <S%H5467><s%> of the sin of Sodom הַֽהֲפוּכָ֣ה <S%H2015><s%> that was overthrown כְמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> in רָ֔גַע <S%H7281><s%> as in a moment וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no חָ֥לוּ <S%H2342><s%> stayed בָ֖הּ יָדָֽיִם׃ <S%H3027><s%> and no hands ס

זַכּ֤וּ <S%H2141><s%> were purer נְזִירֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5139><s%> Her Nazarites מִשֶּׁ֔לֶג <S%H7950><s%> than snow צַח֖וּ <S%H6705><s%> they were whiter מֵחָלָ֑ב <S%H2461><s%> than milk אָ֤דְמוּ <S%H119><s%> they were more ruddy עֶ֙צֶם֙ <S%H6106><s%> in body מִפְּנִינִ֔ים <S%H6443><s%> than rubies סַפִּ֖יר <S%H5601><s%> [was] of sapphire גִּזְרָתָֽם׃ <S%H1508><s%> their polishing ס

חָשַׁ֤ךְ <S%H2821><s%> is blacker מִשְּׁחוֹר֙ <S%H7815><s%> than a coal תָּֽאֳרָ֔ם <S%H8389><s%> Their visage לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> are not נִכְּר֖וּ <S%H5234><s%> they are not known בַּחוּצ֑וֹת <S%H2351><s%> in the streets צָפַ֤ד <S%H6821><s%> cleaveth עוֹרָם֙ <S%H5785><s%> their skin עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עַצְמָ֔ם <S%H6106><s%> to their bones יָבֵ֖שׁ <S%H3001><s%> it is withered הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has become כָעֵֽץ׃ <S%H6086><s%> it is become like a stick ס

טוֹבִ֤ים <S%H2896><s%> are better הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> are those חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> [They that be] slain חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword מֵֽחַלְלֵ֖י <S%H2491><s%> than [they that be] slain רָעָ֑ב <S%H7458><s%> with hunger שֶׁ֣הֵ֤ם <S%H1992><s%> for these יָז֙וּבוּ֙ <S%H2100><s%> pine away מְדֻקָּרִ֔ים <S%H1856><s%> stricken מִתְּנוּבֹ֖ת <S%H8570><s%> through for [want of] the fruits שָׂדָֽי׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the field ס

יְדֵ֗י <S%H3027><s%> The hands נָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> women רַחֲמָ֣נִיּ֔וֹת <S%H7362><s%> of the pitiful בִּשְּׁל֖וּ <S%H1310><s%> have sodden יַלְדֵיהֶ֑ן <S%H3206><s%> their own children הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> became לְבָרוֹת֙ <S%H1262><s%> they were their meat לָ֔מוֹ בְּשֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7667><s%> in the destruction בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> of my people ס

כִּלָּ֤ה <S%H3615><s%> hath accomplished יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמָת֔וֹ <S%H2534><s%> his fury שָׁפַ֖ךְ <S%H8210><s%> he hath poured out חֲר֣וֹן <S%H2740><s%> his fierce אַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> anger וַיַּצֶּת־ <S%H3341><s%> and hath kindled אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire בְּצִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion וַתֹּ֖אכַל <S%H398><s%> and it hath devoured יְסוֹדֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H3247><s%> the foundations ס

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor הֶאֱמִ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H539><s%> would not have believed מַלְכֵי־ <S%H4428><s%> The kings אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth [וְכֹל כ] (כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner ק) יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and all the inhabitants תֵבֵ֑ל <S%H8398><s%> of the world כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Could יָבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> should have entered צַ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> that the adversary וְאוֹיֵ֔ב <S%H341><s%> and the enemy בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֖י <S%H8179><s%> into the gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem ס

מֵֽחַטֹּ֣את <S%H2403><s%> For the sins נְבִיאֶ֔יהָ <S%H5030><s%> of her prophets עֲוֹנ֖וֹת <S%H5771><s%> [and] the iniquities כֹּהֲנֶ֑יהָ <S%H3548><s%> of her priests הַשֹּׁפְכִ֥ים <S%H8210><s%> that have shed בְּקִרְבָּ֖הּ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst דַּ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <S%H6662><s%> of the just ס

נָע֤וּ <S%H5128><s%> They have wandered עִוְרִים֙ <S%H5787><s%> [as] blind בַּֽחוּצ֔וֹת <S%H2351><s%> [men] in the streets נְגֹֽאֲל֖וּ <S%H1351><s%> they have polluted בַּדָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> themselves with blood בְּלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֽוּכְל֔וּ <S%H3201><s%> so that men could יִגְּע֖וּ <S%H5060><s%> touch בִּלְבֻשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3830><s%> their garments ס

ס֣וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> unto them Depart טָמֵ֞א <S%H2931><s%> ye [it is] unclean קָ֣רְאוּ <S%H7121><s%> They cried לָ֗מוֹ ס֤וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> depart ס֙וּרוּ֙ <S%H5493><s%> depart אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּגָּ֔עוּ <S%H5060><s%> touch כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> So נָצ֖וּ <S%H5132><s%> not when they fled away גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again נָ֑עוּ <S%H5128><s%> and wandered אָֽמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> they said בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יוֹסִ֖יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> They shall no more לָגֽוּר׃ <S%H1481><s%> sojourn ס

פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> The anger יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD חִלְּקָ֔ם <S%H2505><s%> hath divided לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> He will not יוֹסִ֖יף <S%H3254><s%> them he will no more לְהַבִּיטָ֑ם <S%H5027><s%> regard פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> not the persons כֹהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> of the priests לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נָשָׂ֔אוּ <S%H5375><s%> them they respected [זְקֵנִים כ] (וּזְקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> aged ק) לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not חָנָֽנוּ׃ <S%H2603><s%> they favoured ס

[עֹודֵינָה כ] (עֹודֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5751><s%> while ק) תִּכְלֶ֣ינָה <S%H3615><s%> as yet failed עֵינֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5869><s%> As for us our eyes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֶזְרָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H5833><s%> help הָ֑בֶל <S%H1892><s%> for our vain בְּצִפִּיָּתֵ֣נוּ <S%H6822><s%> we have watched צִפִּ֔ינוּ <S%H6822><s%> have watched אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about גּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> for a nation לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יוֹשִֽׁעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> [that] could not save ס

צָד֣וּ <S%H6679><s%> They hunt צְעָדֵ֔ינוּ <S%H6806><s%> our steps מִלֶּ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> walk בִּרְחֹבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H7339><s%> in our streets קָרַ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> is near קִצֵּ֛ינוּ <S%H7093><s%> our end מָלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> are fulfilled יָמֵ֖ינוּ <S%H3117><s%> our days כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> is come קִצֵּֽינוּ׃ <S%H7093><s%> for our end ס

קַלִּ֤ים <S%H7031><s%> are swifter הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become רֹדְפֵ֔ינוּ <S%H7291><s%> Our persecutors מִנִּשְׁרֵ֖י <S%H5404><s%> than the eagles שָׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הֶהָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> us upon the mountains דְּלָקֻ֔נוּ <S%H1814><s%> they pursued בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> for us in the wilderness אָ֥רְבוּ <S%H693><s%> they laid wait לָֽנוּ׃ ס

ר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> The breath אַפֵּ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H639><s%> of our nostrils מְשִׁ֣יחַ <S%H4899><s%> the anointed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נִלְכַּ֖ד <S%H3920><s%> was taken בִּשְׁחִיתוֹתָ֑ם <S%H7825><s%> in their pits אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of whom אָמַ֔רְנוּ <S%H559><s%> of whom we said בְּצִלּ֖וֹ <S%H6738><s%> Under his shadow נִֽחְיֶ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> we shall live בַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen ס

שִׂ֤ישִׂי <S%H7797><s%> Rejoice וְשִׂמְחִי֙ <S%H8056><s%> glad בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom [יֹושַׁבְתִּי כ] (יֹושֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> abide ק) בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land ע֑וּץ <S%H5780><s%> of Uz גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> well עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and תַּעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> also shall pass כּ֔וֹס <S%H3563><s%> the cup תִּשְׁכְּרִ֖י <S%H7937><s%> through unto thee thou shalt be drunken וְתִתְעָרִֽי׃ <S%H6168><s%> and shalt make thyself naked ס

תַּם־ <S%H8552><s%> is accomplished עֲוֹנֵךְ֙ <S%H5771><s%> The punishment of thine iniquity בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יוֹסִ֖יף <S%H3254><s%> he will no more לְהַגְלוֹתֵ֑ךְ <S%H1540><s%> carry thee away into captivity פָּקַ֤ד <S%H6485><s%> he will visit עֲוֹנֵךְ֙ <S%H5771><s%> thine iniquity בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom גִּלָּ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> he will discover עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and חַטֹּאתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H2403><s%> thy sins פ
